name: Google News Keyword Meta Tag
author: Giuseppe Soriero

sections.description:
This plugin let you add via Customs Fields box Google-specific metatag to help determine how to best classify your content..

An example from Google News Help Center

Here’s a link to Google News article page.

WordPress 3.4.2 Custom Field Button Disappear BUG

Download and install Hotfix.
sections.installation:
1. Upload gn-news-keyword.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place in the custom field box gn-keyword-meta-tag this only one time. After you’ll find the value in the dropdown list.
sections.faq:
Do I need to use this plugin if my site isn’t listed in Google News?

No, you don’t.
sections.changelog:
0.5

  • Checked for WordPress 4.0′.

0.4

  • Fixed some typo. Work with WP 3.5′.

0.3

  • Fixed meta name from ‘news-keyword’ to ‘news_keywords’.

0.2

  • Fixed meta name from ‘news-keyword’ to ‘news-keywords’.

0.1

  • First release
